data_source.reference: D.S.Leonard et al., Nucl. Instr. and Meth. A 591 (2008)(10.1016/j.nima.2008.03.001)

sample.description: Sheldal superinsulation, item # 146477, 0.25 mil PET aluminized on one side. K result is for dissolved aluminum layer only but normalized to whole sample mass.  For U and Th, the PET layer was also partially dissolved and analyzed.
sample.name: Sheldal superinsulation, 0.25 mil PET aluminized on one side

measurement.description: For each of K, Th, and U, natural terrestrial abundance ratios were used to covert from isotopic to total elemental abundances.
